Description: Minimize time between project start and end

Description: Minimize sum of deviations from estimated task effort

Description: Minimize project cost relative to budget

Description: Maximize average number of stakeholders attending reviews

Name: minimize_epic_estimated_effort
Description: Minimize total estimated effort of active epics
